name: Full Voice Throttle
description:
Drive a motorbike with the pitch of your voice. Can be played in splitscreen with a friend.

Made for the Alt Ctrl Game Jam in Paris.

The pitch of your voice control the engine hand of the speedometer. You need to move the hand to the top of the blue gauge to accelerate.

Once you reach the red gauge, you need to go to the low again with your voice to gear up. And so on, until the 5th gear ;)

"Space" for 2 players. (needs 2 mics)

"Enter" for 1 player.

P key to restart the game

Other useless keys :

Q & D to turn (if you want to explore the level)

W & X to turn the camera.

A to re-calibrate the microhpone (silence)

(I forgot to remove some sounds in the game, so please don't turn on the sound, the game is supposed to be sound-less) :D

Sources : https://github.com/Kushulain/FullVoiceThrottle

Thanks to Ben (https://itch.io/profile/glkitty) for the bike 3D model !

Have fun !
